metadata.title: CVE-2024-24474 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in Qemu before v.8.2.0 allows a remoteattacker to execute arbitrary code via the async_len variable to the FIFObuffer component.

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
